description:
Member of the Elite 13 of the Poseidal Military (Number 10). Lily shows up to assist Giwaza mid-way through the series and participates in multiple battles against the rebels along with Gavlet Gablae and Wassan Lune. Lily is a skilled Heavy Metal pilot, using the Heavy Metal G.Roon.
As the conflict intensifies, Lily continues to pursue and battles the rebels but is killed in battle against Amu while over the planet Gastogal.
name: Lily Hasshi
